headline: Lululemon's lawsuit against Costco highlights the rise of fashion 'dupes'
summary: Fashion “dupes,” or less expensive versions of high-end clothing and other accessories, are just about everywhere these days.  In the latest example, Lululemon slapped a lawsuit against Costco on Friday, accusing the wholesale club operator of selling lower-priced duplicates of some of its popular athleisure apparel.  Want a taste of Hermès' $1,000 fuzzy slippers?

headline: Progress Software Q2, Sweetgreen downgrade, Lululemon & Costco
summary: Progress Software (PRGS) stock plunges after the company's second quarter results failed to impress investors. Sweetgreen (SG) was downgraded to Hold from Buy by a TD Cowen analyst, citing risks about expanding into "unproven" geographies. Lululemon (LULU) sues Costco (COST) for selling knock-off versions of its products. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts here.
